Inside were three girls who were away on a summer break from their college.

The three friends were journeying towards their friend’s Elizabeth’s remote country house to spend sometime away from the overly populated and high emission area of the city. To spend some time in the great outdoors.

“Robert is too conventional. I wanted to have wild sex once in a while.” Elizabeth said as she drove her and her friends through the country towards her house which was unoccupied for the time. The three girls were cheerfully talking about the guys and their sexual adventures.

The house in general was a lavish wooden cottage that connected and overlooked the great lake behind it, it was a two story oak made home with the second floor exterior walls made of brick on the first floor which was wood all around.

The two girls Veronica and Danny were amazed and completely in awe of this structure “This place is freaking awesome!” Veronica cried out as she and Danny walked around the side of the wooden pathway leading around back of the house.

“Look at the lake! It is Beautiful!” Danny breathed out as she leaned on the ledge looking out on the massive lake before her.

The three girls were isolated from any other home in this single home remote landscape.

“Come on girls! Let’s get the Stuff out of the care.” Elizabeth called out to her friends as she began unloading their luggage.

After unloading the Luggage and Provisions, each girl selected their own room upstairs and unpacked in a hurry. They wanted to step out to the backyard and catch the last minutes of sunlights in the nude, with the hopes of getting a good tan without the bikini Lines.

Later when the sun began to disappear in the horizon and it got a bit chilly, the girls decided to step inside and enjoy a bit of wine. Naturally after a few hours later they were dining downstairs, their spirits were high as with the case of the empty bottle on the table and Danny dancing but naked to electronic music before Elizabeth who had put her top and shorts back on while Veronica was in only a towel.

“Move that booty, girl!” Elizabeth cheered Danny on while her friend veronica looked on in envy at her friends moves.

But then! Without warning the floor began to shake and the walls started crackling, the whole world around them seemed to roar out.

It was an Earth quake!

“What the fuck?!/ It’s an Earthquake!/ What should we do?” all three screamed out as they tried to keep themselves from falling onto the floor from the distorting shaking that rattle all around them.

But unbeknownst to them, not far from their home at the bottom of the lake, A huge rock had shifted from it’s original place, leaving a big large hole open where an explosion of bubbles began to surface out from. From the darkest depths of the abyss, a lone long tendril began to surface from within as seen from the low light of the illuminating moon that shined down upon it before more followed as a large bulbous body connected to it all rose up from within it long prison.

Back with the girls, fifteen seconds later, the tremors had stopped and everything returned to normal with no damage done to either the home or the contents it keep within it’s self. The girls, once more relaxed after that scary experience gulped down their weight in drinks, tipsy and tired their moved to go to bed.

“Okay. That was fun, but I’m too drunk. I’m gonna hit the sack.” Veronica said as she climbed up the steps with help from the railing.

“What if there is another earthquake? I’m not sleeping alone.” Danny mumbled out as she held her self closely.

“You can sleep with me if you want. My room has a bigger bed.” Elizabeth offered as she consoled her frightened friend.

152.title: Prologue

info.brief_description: An alien creature crash lands on earth. Where it must find a host to survive
info.description:
A cool spring night was shattered as a strange oval craft rocketed through the sky. It streaked at high speed trailing smoke and flame. Its silver skin glowing red as it pushed through the air. It flew high over a farm causing the horses in a barn to cry out in fear. The craft kept falling traveling several more miles into the wilderness and deep into a small forest, far from prying human eyes. The horses in the farm calmed as the craft struck the forest in the distance with a, mysteriously, quiet crash. The human inhabitants of the farm barely noticed the strange event that had just occurred. They slumber on unaware of the strange craft now hidden in the forest only a few miles from the farm.

At the crash site a large trench had been cut through the trees ending in the smoking craft. Grey smoke rose from burning wood but the craft itself seemed almost undamaged. Only a slight tear in the top indicated its harsh entry to earths solid ground. It was quiet in the forest as every creature had fled when the ship had arrived.

A blue light emanated from the silver oval and a door opened on its side. A strange bipedal creature stepped out. It had two arms and legs attached to a thick torso and small head. Its blue eyes searched the forest as it leaned on the door way for support. Two tendrils lay flat on its back which was uncovered on its naked body. It has no distinctive sexual feature or organs. Its body is a light purple and looked almost see thought. No organs or bones were visible inside its flesh the creature seemed to be made of semitransparent jelly.

The alien glanced back into the ship one last time before slowly walking into the forest. As it got out of sight of the craft, a bright flash lights up the night, and the craft vanishes from the torn forest floor. The alien leans against a tree resting for several minutes. It stood and continued onward toward the direction of the farm.

I will delete any chapter I don't like This could be because they are two short or have poor grammar. Try your best! I'm excited to see where this leads!

Other then that do what you want. If its interesting it stays.

Try to focus on

Unbirth and Pregnancy. The alien is searching for a host to both heal and maybe create a copy of itself. It not generally hostile but will defend itself if need be.
